name: Rosie D.
description:
8. Thats how many times I have to blink before I get up from bed. 4. Thats how many times I have to check if I really turned off that stove. Life with OCD is a challenge. But it is also an advantage. Help Rosie getting ready for her date with Alex. A guy she met at her coffee place, after disturbing her routine. 

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/rosie-d-4
